Description:
Detects AWS API key creation for a user by another user.
Backdoored users can be used to obtain persistence in the AWS environment.
Also with this alert, you can detect a flow of AWS keys in your org.


Author: faloker
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: AWS IAM Backdoor Users Keys
Query: sourcetype='aws-cloudtrail' eql select * from _source_ where ((eventsource = 'iam.amazonaws.com' and eventname = 'createaccesskey') and  not useridentity.arn like '%responseelements.accesskey.username%')
